name: Asian Lentil Lettuce Wraps
author: mclairethev
summary: A delicious and healthy take on restaurant-style lettuce wraps. Garnish with carrots, bean sprouts, sriracha sauce, and chopped peanuts.
ingredients: 1 (8 ounce) package gourmet mushroom blend, roughly chopped
1 cup matchstick-cut carrots, plus more for garnish
directions: Bring a pot of lightly salted water to a boil over medium-high heat
Reduce heat; simmer until tender, 15 to 20 minutes
Heat a skillet over medium-high heat and spray with cooking spray
Add mushrooms, carrots, and 1 clove garlic; cook and stir until tender, about 5 minutes
Whisk honey, soy sauce, rice vinegar, peanut butter, sriracha sauce, chile paste, ginger, sesame seeds, and sesame oil together in a bowl until sauce is well blended
Stir lentils and sauce into the mushroom mixture in the skillet until filling is combined and sauce is absorbed
Arrange lettuce leaves on a plate
Place a spoonful of the filling in each leaf
